idea-plugin.name: FEEL Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
Language support for FEEL (Friendly Enough Expression Language) powered by a Language Server Protocol implementation.

Features:
  • Syntax highlighting for .feel files
  • Real-time syntax error detection and diagnostics
  • Hover documentation for 80+ built-in functions
  • Code completion with IntelliSense for keywords and functions
  • Semantic token highlighting

All features are powered by the FEEL Language Server via LSP integration.
